job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer - 100% Remote
job.description: Title: Full Stack Software EngineerLocation: 100% RemoteFull time/Direct HireWhat We're Looking ForWe are looking for someone who takes pride in the craft and wants to be part of a team of talented engineers working to further Till's growth. You'll partner with engineering teams, product managers, analysts, and customer success to design, build, and maintain our technology platform.ResponsibilitiesOwn one or multiple projects from start to finish and be guided by the support of a dedicated manager, mentor or lead engineerParticipate in daily team processes and learn all aspects of the software development lifecycleTrack data that will allow us to better understand how we can improve our productsLearn about the business and engineering practicesIncrementally increased the quality and reliability of our payment processing systemAbout YouExcellent written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills, able to effectively collaborate with technical and business partnersHave the ability to learn quicklyEnjoy working independently and as part of a teamPossess the ability to solve real-time technology problemsAre a self-starter and possess strong sense of self-motivationAre selfless. Ideas don't have to originate from you in order for you to commit to a path forwardValue ownership and autonomyFluency in at least one non-Bash programming language such as Python, Ruby, Go, JavaScript / Node.js, Java, C#, or C/CExperience with (or a willingness to learn) at least one major front end development framework React, Vue, Angular)Experience with at least one cloud platform such as AWS, Azure, or GCPBonus PointsExperience with CloudFormation or TerraformFamiliarity with at least one CI / CD tool such as Harness, GitHub Actions, Spinnaker, Jenkins, or CircleCIExperience with at least one log/metrics/alerting tools such as DataDog, Sumologic, FluentD, Prometheus, ELK, or SplunkExperience with DynamoDB, Security Scanning Tools, AWS Multi-Region configuration, SnowflakeOur Tech StackExperience with some of these would be helpful. We'll teach you the rest!AWS Lambda | DynamoDB | ECS | Docker | SQS | CloudFormation JavaScript | PythonVue.jsSnowflakeBenefitsHealth insurance with 100% premium covered for employee Flexible/Untracked PTO / sick leaveChild care and health FSAPaid parental leave401K Interested candidate please send your latest resume at sarath@mindsource.com
